Issue.creator: oleksandr.borysenko
Issue.summary: Image fabric-ccenv was not automatically pulled for chaincode instantiate
Issue.description: ERRO 03a Failed to generate platform-specific docker build: Error creating container: no such image peer0 | 2017-04-12 13:22:29.076 UTC dockercontroller deployImage -> ERRO 03b Error building images: Failed to generate platform-specific docker build: Error creating container: no such image peer0 | 2017-04-12 13:22:29.076 UTC dockercontroller deployImage -> ERRO 03c Image Output: peer0 | ******************** peer0 | peer0 | ******************** peer0 | 2017-04-12 13:22:29.076 UTC chaincode Launch -> ERRO 03d launchAndWaitForRegister failed Error starting container: Failed to generate platform-specific docker build: Error creating container: no such image {noformat} I pulled {code} docker pull hyperledger/fabric-ccenv:x86_64-1.0.0-alpha {code} And It fixed issue:
